mapper.select: select id, sort, title, cover, content, create_time, state, admin_id from t_news
select id, sort, title, cover, content, create_time, state, admin_id from t_news where state != 0 limit #{offset},#{rows}
select id, sort, title, cover, content, create_time, state, admin_id from t_news where state = 0 limit #{offset},#{rows}
SELECT id, title, cover, ABS(NOW() - create_time ) AS diffTime FROM t_news ORDER BY diffTime LIMIT 0, 2
select count(*) from t_news where sort = #{sort}
select id, sort, cover, title, content from t_news where title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_news(sort, title, cover, content, create_time, state, admin_id) values (#{sort}, #{title}, #{cover}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{adminId})
mapper.update:
update t_news
sort = #{sort},
title = #{title},
cover = #{cover},
content = #{content},
create_time = #{createTime},
state = #{state},
admin_id = #{adminId},
where id = #{id}
update t_news set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
